name: sinfonia
description: A beautiful process runner for parallel commands with interactive filtering

scripts.test:all: bun run src/index.ts "counter=bun test.js test1" "random=bun test.js test2" "time=bun test.js test3"
scripts.test:groups: bun run src/index.ts "timers:counter=bun test.js test1" "timers:time=bun test.js test3" "random:gen1=bun test.js test2" "random:gen2=bun test.js test2"
scripts.test:deps: bun run src/index.ts "db=bun test.js test4" "api@db=bun test.js test5 :: {db: 'Database ready!'}" "web@api=bun test.js test6 :: {api: 'API server ready on port 3000!'}"
